meanings.definition: Covered in a messy or sticky substance
meanings.sent1: The gloppiest sandwich I ever made had jelly dripping all over it.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were the gloppiest after playing with the mud.
meanings.sent3: The gloppiest art project in class was a glue mishap that stuck everything together.
meanings.sent4: The rain made the streets look gloppiest, like a giant spilled a paint can.
meanings.sent5: The gloppiest slime was so sticky, it got stuck to everything it touched.

meanings.definition: Having the most liquid or sloppiness
meanings.sent1: Out of all the drinks, the gloppiest one was the overflowing milkshake.
meanings.sent2: The gloppiest soup in the pot was the one with the most broth.
meanings.sent3: The gloppiest water balloon burst and soaked everyone nearby.
meanings.sent4: The gloppiest river overflowed its banks after heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The gloppiest smoothie was so runny, it spilled over the edges of the glass.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of neatness or organization
meanings.sent1: Her room was the gloppiest with clothes strewn all over the floor.
meanings.sent2: The gloppiest desk in the office had papers scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The gloppiest group project was a mess of uncoordinated ideas.
meanings.sent4: The gloppiest schedule was so chaotic, no one knew what was happening next.
meanings.sent5: The gloppiest handwriting was so messy, it was hard to read.
